changelogs.text: Crosshair Mod: 3 new styles
Animations Mod: Smooth sneak setting
Hotbar Mod: New option to use the client theme
Hotbar Mod: New pickup animation setting
New Mod: Female gender, cosmetic that makes your character female
New Mod: Cat ears
Client: Added more Language support
Client: Added UI sounds
HUD: Added new HUD styles
HUD: Added Blurred background option
HUD: Added Mojangles font option
Menus: GuiIngameMenu now uses the Glide style
Cosmetics: Added a ton of new capes
Cosmetics: Made Custom capes better
Mod Menu: 10+ new themes
Mod Menu: New home screen
Mod Menu: New Minigames to play in the client while you wait for games to start (bird and clickyCat)
Mod Menu: Back buttons in more places
Mod Menu: Improve the mod menu design
Mod Menu: Made it so when you search it will search also for common aliases of the mod
Mod Menu: you can now just Type to search without engaging the search bar
Mod Menu: you can now use arrow keys to scroll up and down
Mod Menu: Modules will now warn you that they may be banable
Client: You can now click out of bounds in some GUIs and it will close
Client: Change the setup menu
Client: Glide will check for its own updates
Client: Rebrand most of the client to glide and change the fonts for this
Client: Made GlideClient compatible with linux and macOS
HudEditor: Made it so you can use a shift key modifier to disable snapping and make movement/scaling more precise and delete mods by pressing backspace
HudEditor: Added useful tooltips
Cosmetics: Capes now save when the game closes
Mods: Remove browser since it impacts performance
Mods: Remove ViaVersion since it impacts performance
Client: Remove Music player since it impacts performance
Client: Remove Soar API and replace it with remote features
Client: Remove Soar Premium so all featurs are free
